nodes.title: help
nodes.Description: This returns a list of nodes with descriptions

nodes.title: getMessage
nodes.Description: Returns JSON for given message in the queue
nodes.ParametersDesc: A url to a queue, the count of messages wanted (optional)

nodes.title: createFIFOQueue
nodes.Description: Creates a queue in AWS SQS so that the mirror can pull from it
nodes.ParametersDesc: A a unique hashed string that will then be used as the queue name

nodes.title: sendFifoMessage
nodes.Description: Send a message to a queue via query parameters
nodes.ParametersDesc: the queue you want to send to, stringified message you want to send, x and y location denoted as 'x,y' ie 1,1, a numeric value for how big you want the font, Hex colour value for font colour
nodes.ErrorMessage: Queue or message payload were not passed :(
nodes.ErrorDescription: You didn't pass the query parameters of the queueurl correctly, or message correctly

nodes.title: sendFIFOMessagePOST
nodes.Description: Same as sending a message except via a post request
nodes.Parameters: Sample in the github repo under PostSample.json
nodes.ParametersDesc: queueurl holds the queue, data holds the payload that you want to send to a queue
nodes.ErrorMessage: Queue or message payload were not passed :(
nodes.ErrorDescription: You didn't pass the query parameters of the queueurl correctly, or message correctly
